thread.section_title: Hilton Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: St Patrick's Day Family get-together
thread.title_full: St Patrick's Day Family get-together - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gerard F
title: St Patrick's Day Family get-together
text:
Great location, very spacious rooms, best hotel fitness center I have seen. The staff were outstanding, genuinely interested in making sure enjoyed our stay. Got a "roll away bed" that actually provided a good night's sleep.
This is the perfect place to stay if you are visiting the city.
Close to theatre, Port Authority, Times Square.
